properties.displayName: Application Gateway Web Application Firewall is assigned to Application Gateway but disabled
properties.description: Highlights when an Application Gateway Web Application Firewall is assigned to a WAF enabled Application Gateway, but the WAF state is disabled. This indicates the Application Gateway is Tiered for WAF but not using it, which is wasted costs.

metadata.description: Specify the effect of the policy. Options are Audit, Deny, or Disabled.
